document_data.name: Sethel
document_data.mainbody: '''Sethel''' was a scribe and librarian of [[Freedale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: His local knowledge was solid, and he could find more information if needed, including the weaknesses of monsters, for instance.
document_data.Possessions: Sethel was the proprietor of Freedale's library.
document_data.Activities: He maintained the library and sometimes did research on commission.
document_data.Relationships: He was friends with local adventurer [[Morganth]] the Mysterious.
document_data.History: Morganth and Sethel studied under the same master and Sethel became a historian afterwards. He later opened a library in Freedale.
